summary: I LISTED THIS TRAILER IN MY PROFILE, BUT DON'T KNOW IF I DID SO SUCCESSFULLY.  THE DROP-DOWN CHOICES FOR THE MAKE AND MODEL DID NOT INCLUDE TNTT OR CARHAUL (TILT-BED CAR HAULER), RESPECTIVELY.  I CHOSE "TRAILER" AND THE ONLY OFFERED CHOICE FOR MODEL.  WILL I RECEIVE APPROPRIATE NOTICES?  IF NOT, HOW CAN I PROPERLY LIST THE TRAILER?
